--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> OOC: ???
> 

I assume that the ??? is directed at me??? 

I assumed that since Nic, who as far as I know was the originator or
atleast player of Vorpal, was presenting himself to the minions on the
moon that someone else would have to play Vorpal. I don't know what
other minions are on the moon at the moment. If someone else wants to
run Vorpal, by all means feel free I was not trying to hog all the
minions. I am still somewhat confused by who runs what, which is why I
asked all those questions. Btw, is anyone going to flesh him out, or
will he remain a secret?

On another note, should be posting for the other minions on earth later
today!

Preston
(Da'minion)
